QAPair.Question: What is (are) Psoriasis - resources ?
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations are good resources for information about psoriasis : American Academy of Dermatology Association -- www.aad.org/public/diseases/psoriasis , National Institute of Arthritis and Musculoskeletal and Skin Diseases -- www.niams.nih.gov/health-topics/psoriasis , National Psoriasis Foundation -- www.psoriasis.org , US National Library of Medicine, MedlinePlus -- medlineplus.gov/psoriasis.html ,
